thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 46 of 3179
thread.title: ME Migone

author: ME Migone
title: ME Migone
text:
It was easy to book the car and also good value. What confuses me on all car rental websites is what exactly the insurance covers. I still don't know and that is annoying. I'll probably end up spending lots more money when I pick up the car and get this explanation. All websites are equally bad but I would specifically hire from a website that explains this clearly!
Maria
